## probeTerminalPalette() function

Probe the terminal for its color palette.

Uses OSC escape sequences to query the terminal for: - All 16 ANSI colors (indices 0-15) - Default foreground color - Default background color

Returns null if probing fails, times out, or if not running in a TTY (when requireTTY is true).

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function probeTerminalPalette(options?: ProbeOptions): Promise<ProbeResult | null>;
```
